#include <stdio.h>
#include <string>
#include <algorithm>
#include <math.h>
#include <iostream>
#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int main() {
    long long int t;
    scanf ("%lld",&t);
    while (t--)
    {
        int n,p,count=0,a;
        scanf ("%d %d",&n,&p);
        for (int i=0;i<n;i++)
        {
            scanf ("%d",&a);
            if (a>=p)
                count++;
        }
        printf ("%d\n",count);
    }
	return 0;
}
